entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
